name: Musical Camp
details: User authentication by Email password, Google. Only logged in users can see product details.
Image hosting on imgbb.com and Payment method implement.
Admin dashboard,instructor dashboard and user dashboard.

name: Our Heros
details: This website offers a wide variety of toys to choose from, including action figures, dolls, and more. Have a user-friendly search system that allows users to find the toys they are looking for quickly
When an admin user is logged in this admin can add a toy, update a toy or delete a toy.
If a user searches the wrong route, they can find a 404 page. User authentication by Email password, Google. Only logged in users can see product details.

name: Kitchen Secret
details: Developed and maintained a large recipe database. Every user can find their favorite individual chefs recipe.
Interactive Cooking Steps: Enhance user experience with step-by-step instructions, visuals, and timers,ensuring intuitive and successful execution of recipes.
User authentication by Email password, Google andGithub. Only logged in users can see the recipes.
